resources.string: This app is meant to let climbers record the climbs that they have done. I am hoping to add an API of local outdoor routes, and possible a way for local gyms to allow visitors to quickly record set routes, maybe by using a QR code. Also I'd like to integrate YouTube recording is possible.
About the author: Kyle Tenzeldam, I am currently attending Epicodus in Portland Oregon and working in the Java/Android track training to become and Junior Developer.
